arg.name: blob_path
arg.description: The absolute filepath to the NN blob

arg.name: sync_nn
arg.description: Whether to sync the depth and preview frames before making inference

arg.name: detector_name
arg.description: The name given to this detector

arg.name: frame_id
arg.description: The frame ID for the camera

arg.name: level_name
arg.description: The level or map on which the camera is located

arg.name: obstacle_classification
arg.description: The classification to be used to report human obstacles

arg.name: debug
arg.description: If True, the detection results will be visualized

arg.name: rmf_frame_id
arg.description: The frame_id w.r.t which RMF coordinates are defined

arg.name: x
arg.description: x translation between RMF and camera frames

arg.name: y
arg.description: y translation between RMF and camera frames

arg.name: z
arg.description: z translation between RMF and camera frames

arg.name: roll
arg.description: roll rotation between RMF and camera frames

arg.name: pitch
arg.description: pitch rotation between RMF and camera frames

arg.name: yaw
arg.description: yaw rotation between RMF and camera frames

node.name: oakd_to_rmf_transformer
node.args: $(var x) $(var y) $(var z) $(var roll) $(var pitch) $(var yaw) $(var rmf_frame_id) $(var frame_id)
